Node.definition: literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

Node.gloss: to be, become weak|to be, become powerless|to be sick|to be injured

= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to cause to turn around|to roll
Node.definition: literally: to turn (one's) face; hence: = action by which humans turn their face in a certain direction

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= flat construction, ◄ normally made of stone, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker introducing a very humble request
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= man, also known as Jehizkiah (יְחִזְקִיָּה) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= indirect male progenitor

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= fluid appearing in the eye; ≈ primarily associated with grief and mourning

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to add days or years to someone's life|to allow (someone) to live longer
Node.definition: literally: to add days or years; hence: = causative action by which deities allow humans to live longer than expected
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

literally: palm of the hand, with the focus on one of the activities that are performed with the hands: to hold someone against that person's will; = condition of being under the malevolent control of another person or group
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which a deity keeps people or town safe from harm or injury, as with a shield

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= cake; ◄ made of pressed dried figs; ► used as food and occasionally as medical treatment

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree

particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= process by which something moves backwards

Node.gloss: to be a trivial matter|to be of no consequence|to come easy
Node.definition: = state in which an event is regarded as relatively unimportant, not requiring much effort or thought

= process by which something moves backwards
= pertaining to a movement in a direction away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

= pertaining to a movement in a direction away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= causative action by which humans send a message, (supposedly) in the form of a written document to someone else
= man, also known as Merodach Baladan (מְרֹדַךְ בַּלְאֲדָן) ◄ son of Baladan (בַּלְאֲדָן) ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל) who sent envoys to king Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) after his illness and recovery
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= man, also known as Jehizkiah (יְחִזְקִיָּה) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
literally: to cause to hold, carry; hence: = causative action by which humans take hold of objects and bring them to another location
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which people accumulate wealth for themselves and store it up in a designated place
= indirect male progenitor
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= state in which humans, animals, or objects remain in a certain place after part of the original quantity has been located elsewhere

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process of conception, described as going out from one's father's seed
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which males among humans and animals generate offspring
= a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= state in which a condition is trustworthy in that it lasts for a prolonged time
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= events that have taken place, that are not among a range of events that have been described or dealt with in a certain way; used for acts of kings only
= man, also known as Jehizkiah (יְחִזְקִיָּה) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= events that require the ability to accomplish great things through characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= relatively large reservoir ◄ dug by human hands ► to collect water; place where many public activities take place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

Node.gloss: The Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah
Node.definition: = a book containing the events of the reigns of the kings of Judah
literally: words of days; hence: = a written record of events
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: to lie down with one's fathers > to rest with one's ancestors
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with one's fathers; hence: = process by which a human being dies and so shares the fate and destination of his/her ancestors; ≈ only said of people in positions demanding respect, such as patriarchs and kings
= man, also known as Jehizkiah (יְחִזְקִיָּה) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= indirect male progenitor

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= man; ◄ son of Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
